mapper.select: SELECT A.EXAM_SN, A.EXAM_NUMBER, A.EXAM_TITLE, A.EXAM_ANSWER, A.EXAM_TYPE, A.EXAM_CONTENT, A.EXAM_INFO_CD FROM EXAM A, EXAM_INFO B WHERE A.EXAM_INFO_CD = B.EXAM_INFO_CD AND A.EXAM_INFO_CD = #{examInfoCd}
mapper.insert: insert into exam(EXAM_SN, EXAM_NUMBER, EXAM_TITLE, EXAM_ANSWER, EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_CONTENT, EXAM_INFO_CD) values('E'||SEQ_EXAM.nextval, #{examNumber}, #{examTitle}, #{examAnswer}, #{examType}, #{examContent}, #{examInfoCd})

insert into exam_info(EXAM_INFO_CD, EXAM_INFO_TITLE, EXAM_INFO_CATEGORY, EXAM_INFO_DATE, EXAM_INFO_CONTENT, ESTBL_COURS_CD, EXAM_INFO_TIMELIMIT) values('EF'||SEQ_EXAMINFO.nextval, #{examInfoTitle}, #{examInfoCategory}, #{examInfoDate}, #{examInfoContent}, #{estblCoursCd}, #{examInfoTimelimit})
